name: Brevo

attributeCategory.natural_language_description: 参数名: Category | 作用: Category of the attribute | 默认值: normal | (必填项)

attributeType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type | 作用: Attribute Type | (必填项)

attributeValue.natural_language_description: 参数名: Value | 作用: Value of the attribute | (必填项)

attributeCategoryList.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact Attribute List | 默认值: {}

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Name of the sender | (必填项)

email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: Email of the contact | (必填项)

id.name: id
id.description: ID of the sender to delete
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sender ID | 作用: ID of the sender to delete

createContactAttributes.name: createContactAttributes
createContactAttributes.description: Array of attributes to be added
createContactAttributes.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact Attributes | 作用: Array of attributes to be added | 默认值: {}

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: sort (值: None) - Sort the results in the ascending/descending order of record creation

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: modifiedSince (值: None) - Filter (urlencoded) the contacts modified after a given UTC date-time (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.SSSZ)

identifier.name: identifier
identifier.description: Email (urlencoded) OR ID of the contact OR its SMS attribute value
identifier.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact Identifier | 作用: Email (urlencoded) OR ID of the contact OR its SMS attribute value | (必填项)

updateAttributes.name: updateAttributes
updateAttributes.description: Array of attributes to be updated

upsertAttributes.description: Array of attributes to be updated
upsertAttributes.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact Attributes | 作用: Array of attributes to be updated | 默认值: {}

sendHTML.name: sendHTML
sendHTML.natural_language_description: 参数名: Send HTML | 默认值: False

subject.name: subject
subject.natural_language_description: 参数名: Subject | 作用: Subject of the email

textContent.name: textContent
textContent.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text Content | 作用: Text content of the message

htmlContent.name: htmlContent
htmlContent.natural_language_description: 参数名: HTML Content | 作用: HTML content of the message

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 作用: Additional fields to add | 默认值: {}
available_options: emailTags (值: None) - Add tags to your emails to find them more easily
templateParameters (值: None) - Pass a set of attributes to customize the template

requestOptions.name: requestOptions
requestOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Request Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: allowUnauthorizedCerts (值: None) - Whether to accept the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible
proxy (值: None) - HTTP proxy to use. If authentication is required it can be defined as follow: http://username:password@myproxy:3128
timeout (值: None) - Time in ms to wait for the server to send response headers (and start the response body) before aborting the request
